name: 行銷通路管理
description: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with marketing channels. The marketing channel is one of the four Ps of the marketing mix, providing many essential services to end-customers that the firm cannot efficiently provide itself. Selecting and managing the channel is the focus of this course. The objective of this course is to inculcate in students the ability to develop, implement, and critically evaluate the channel strategy for a firm.
